content: Act as a helpful AI assistant

In Julia, Given a struct `FloatWithUnits` with fields `value` and `unit` (make sure to define it!), write a `show` method for it that will concatenate the value and unit with a space like this "1.8 meters".

```julia
using Printf

mutable struct FloatWithUnits
    value::Float64
    unit::String
end

# Define a show method for FloatWithUnits
show(io::IO, x::FloatWithUnits) = printf(io, "%.1f %s", x.value, x.unit)
```
